review: I am enjoying my fire TV stick
author: Diane Clanton

review: I like that all the Amazon prime options are readily available in the on screen menu I.e. music, movies and all the other features that are included. Great item if on the road and you're tired of regular TV you can simply plug and play granted you have a WiFi connection.
author: scot luthi

review: Its a great concept. But, there are picture and sound jitters and pauses that are frustrating.
author: Patrick Hecht
